H0.text: The famous Badnutt’s Palace Hotel is in which European winter resort. Interlaken

H3.text: The famous Badnutt’s Palace Hotel is in which European winter resort. St-Moritz

A4.text: The Badrutt's Palace Hotel (Five Star) has a staff of 520 persons and is the biggest employer in St. Moritz.
